        <general>

          <title>
            <string language="hu">Sárospatak</string>
            <string language="en">Sarospatak</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sarospatak</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sarospatak</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sarospatak</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sarospatak</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Sarospatak</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sarospatak</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Sárospatak, a vár építéstörténete és reneszánsz építészeti tagozatai, faragványai.</string>
            <string language="en">Sarospatak, the architectural history of the castle, division and carving of the renaissance architecture</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">16. száazd,  17. száazd,  renezsánsz,  későreneszánsz,  Sárospatak,  loggia,  Lórántffy Zsuzsanna,  Perényi-család,  </string>
            <string language="en">16th century, 17th century, renaissance, late renaissance, Sárospatak, loggia, Zsuzsanna Lórántffy, Perényi family</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sarospatak, die architektonische Geschichte des 
Schlosses, der Abteilung und des Schnitzens der 
Renaissancearchitektur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sarospatak, l'histoire architecturale du 
château, de la division et du découpage de l'architecture de la 
Renaissance</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sarospatak, o history architectural do castelo, da
divisão e do carving da arquitetura do renascimento</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sarospatak, la storia architettonica del 
castello, della divisione e della scultura dell'architettura di 
rinascita</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Sarospatak, η αρχιτεκτονική ιστορία του κάστρου, 
τμήμα και χάραξη της αρχιτεκτονικής αναγέννησης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sarospatak, la historia arquitectónica del 
castillo, de la división y de tallar de la configuración del 
renacimiento</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">16. Jahrhundert, 17. Jahrhundert, Renaissance, späte 
Renaissance, Sárospatak, Loggia, Zsuzsanna Lórántffy, Perényi 
Familie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">16ème siècle, 17ème siècle, la Renaissance, la 
Renaissance en retard, Sárospatak, bungalow, Zsuzsanna 
Lórántffy, famille de Perényi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">1õ século, 17o século, renascimento, renascimento 
atrasado, Sárospatak, loggia, Zsuzsanna Lórántffy, família de 
Perényi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sedicesimo secolo, diciassettesimo secolo, rinascita, 
rinascita ritardata, Sárospatak, loggia, Zsuzsanna Lórántffy, 
famiglia di Perényi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">16$ος αιώνας, 17$ος αιώνας, αναγέννηση, πρόσφατη 
αναγέννηση, Sαrospatak, loggia, Zsuzsanna Lσrαntffy, 
οικογένεια Perιnyi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">décimosexto siglo, 17mo siglo, renacimiento, último 
renacimiento, Sárospatak, logia, Zsuzsanna Lórántffy, familia de 
Perényi</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
